snippet: Cristiano Ronaldo ended his road scoring drought with a second-half goal as Real Madrid won, 2-0, at Roma in the first leg of a round-of-16 Champions League matchup.
abstract: Real Madrid defeats Roma, 2-0, in first leg of round-of-16 Champions League matchup; other soccer scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Cristiano Ronaldo ended his road scoring drought with a second-half goal as Real Madrid won, 2-0, at Roma in the first leg of a round-of-16 Champions League matchup.
